p: The pollen season is 163 days per year on average. The longest season occurred in 2001 (192 days, mainly due to Alnus) whilst the shortest season occurred in 2000 (140 days; Figure 2a). The highest YPI ( Figure 1a) occurred in 1999 (17,012 p/m 3): this value was obtained from the very high values of Ostrya pollen concentration (12,653 p/m 3) followed by significant values of Alnus (1869 p/m 3) and Corylus (1656 p/m 3).
